column2: "<%me>, is something wrong? Is there something strange with how I look?"
"1. Your hair color, is that...?"
"2. The atmosphere around you seems a bit strange."
"My hair color? I guess you could say it's... a feature."
"Oh... I see. But I'm just an ordinary ARKS operative."
"There's not really a point in lying about that, Aika."
"Commander."
"Like you, Aika bears the burden of having temporarily held Dark Falz's power. At this point though, it's more akin to a scar."
"Half a year ago, there was an incident where Dark Falz [Apprentice] had tried to resurrect itself."
"With Matoi's help, we were able to seal Dark Falz [Apprentice] away again, but..."
"I was a bit reckless. ...This coloring was a result."
"\"A bit reckless\" is an irresponsible explanation. Not only did you cause Matoi --who had just awoken-- to become involved, but things almost got out of hand."
"That's true... But..."
"1. ...Matoi was involved as well?"
"2. I want to know the full story."
"Alright. Perhaps this would be a good time to explain, don't you think, Aika?"
"I'd taken all of Dark Falz's energy from Itsuki and Rina --I mean, our allies-- and was prepared to be sealed as a consequence."
"But Matoi, intent on saving me, took it unto herself, with the intent on redirecting it back into Lilipa to seal it there again."
"However, Matoi was recently reawakened, and was subsequently in a weakened state, and was unable to control it."
"She'd begun to absorb the energy gathered within Aika's body into her own."
"I'm certain that Matoi knew what would happen."
"As a vessel for such energies, Matoi is on a whole different level than I. She knew the consequences of saving me."
"Even if she would become the [Profound Darkness] once again, she was prepared to sacrifice herself without looking back."
"But then something happened out of nowhere."
"\"Dio Hunar\". It's referred to by ARKS as the incarnation of the [Profound Darkness]. According to our records, it was present for less than a minute."
"Without intentions of restoring, nor awakening Dark Falz [Apprentice], it absorbed the darkness from us both... and left."
"It had simply looked at Matoi... then left."
"And that's what happened. The rest was mostly cleanup, but that proved to be the hardest part."
"While Aika had miraculously managed to avoid becoming a vessel for Dark Falz, her body was corrupted to a noticable extent. I'm honestly amazed she's survived this ordeal."
"I have Matoi to thank for that. It took me half a year to recover, but I am walking well with minimal damage."
"Matoi, unfortunately, had to return to a temporary cold sleep afterwards to purify the corruption."
"Because of her previous records, I'm sure you understand the medical team's full alert regarding her status."
"That said, you shouldn't have to wait much longer."
"I received a message from the medical team a few days ago. You should be able to see her soon."
"I'm still confused by Dio Hunar's actions."
"Why did it leave without doing anything to us? I still don't understand why."
"A good question... but I don't think you or I will ever know. We are not it, after all."
"Though, you might have an idea yourself. Am I correct?"
